summary: Adds a new Inn to a road just outside of dawnstar.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Thank you all very much for the 100 dowloads!!!

Main Info:
[/b]A new Inn has appeared on the map, one that will bring shame to those farmhouse-like Inn's that are already in the game, The Wyvern Waystone Inn.
Also, don't worry about the spirit in the dwemer vase.

[b]Location:
[/b]next to the road leading out of the southern part of dawnstar.

[b]Unique Features:
[/b]- invisible seating markers (4 in total)
- everything is static
- a signable guestbook
- a spirit in a dwemer vase

[b]Todo:
[/b]- finish upstairs area
- fix navmeshing
- fix guestbook scripting issue
- add npc's
- add custom sign outside
- MORE CLUTTER!!!

[b]Also...
[/b]I'm looking for someone to help me add a quest to this mod about why it has "waystone" in the name
and why there is a spirit in the dwemer vase.

[b]Special Thanks:
[/b]- Elianora & Darkfox127 for youtube tutorials.
- @JavaPlaza,
  @achintyagk,
  @sonic65101,
  @CRAGie,
  @Outlander[3D] for all kind's of help via the nmm discord server.
author: Chickenator587

files.name: (TWWI) The Wyvern Waystone Inn 1.0
files.changelogHtml:
version 1.0
this is the first version of this mod
